thread.title: The Ghazi Attack: First week Box Office collections figures of Rana Daggubati starrer are out! | Zee News
thread.title_full: The Ghazi Attack: First week Box Office collections figures of Rana Daggubati starrer are out! | Zee News

title: The Ghazi Attack: First week Box Office collections figures of Rana Daggubati starrer are out! | Zee News
text:
Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Rana Daggubati's latest film 'The Ghazi Attack' is slowly and steadily inching towards Rs 30 crore mark at the Box Office. The Sankalp Reddy directorial has not only impressed the audience with its powerful content but also charmed the critics with its breakthrough performances. 
"#TheGhaziAttack - All version: Fri 4.25 cr, Sat 5.25 cr, Sun 6.25 cr, Mon 3.65 cr, Tue 3.15 cr, Wed 2.40 cr, Thu 2.30 cr. Total: ₹ 27.25 cr," Hindi movie critic and business analyst taran Adarsh tweeted. 
Apart from Hindi, the flick was simultaneously released in Telugu and Tamil as well. #TheGhaziAttack - All version: Fri 4.25 cr, Sat 5.25 cr, Sun 6.25 cr, Mon 3.65 cr, Tue 3.15 cr, Wed 2.40 cr, Thu 2.30 cr. Total: ₹ 27.25 cr. 
— taran adarsh (@taran_adarsh) 24 February 2017 
In 'The Ghazi Attack', Rana plays Lt Commander Arjun Varma. It also stars Kay Kay Menon, Atul Kulkarni and Taapsee Pannu in prominent roles. MUST READ 
The flick showcases the story about an executive naval officer of the Indian submarine S21 and his team who remain underwater for 18 days. First Published: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 16:47 More from zeenews
